slides.text: Hello, I am the Pampa Spirit! Our region is the most productive, but the severe drought is forcing us to cancel planting.
Your mission is to analyze CONAE's satellite information to find hidden water and save our harvest.
The information we will use is from CONAE's SAOCOM satellite. Below, I will show you the analysis of the Moisture Profile so you know how to use it.
Look at the general map. The red and yellow colors tell you the surface is dry. If you trust your eyes, you'll cancel planting.
Now, look at what SAOCOM really sees. The blue and green colors reveal that there is a stable water reserve starting at 60 cm. This hidden water is enough if we are precise.
SAOCOM's analysis gave you the most precise data: there is a water reserve, but it is limited. How would you risk planting, knowing the water needs to last longer?

quiz.question: Which decision aligns with our precision analysis, allowing us to plant and conserve the reserve moisture?
options: B: Reduce Planting Density. (Fewer plants consume less reserve water)
quiz.winMessage: CONGRATULATIONS! You have saved the harvest.
quiz.loseMessage: Unfortunately, you have not managed to save your harvest. Try again.
